meaning_str.bing:
adj. 有用的；有益的；实用的；有帮助的
网络. 具利用价值；有用性；有效的

有用的；有益的；实用的；有帮助的
具利用价值；有用性；有效的

有用的；实用的；有效的；有益的；有帮助的；功用性的；适用的

1.en: This probably would not be very useful as it would only be possible to everaccess one cache at a time.
1.cn: 这可能并不是很有效，因为在同一时间只有可能存取一个缓存。

2.en: Different laptops may respond to 'standby' in different ways - in many it is only a temporary state and may not be useful for you.
2.cn: 不同的笔记型电脑有不同的「待机」方式-多数情况下只是一个临时状态，不一定对您有用。

3.en: And this model is going to be very, very useful for a lot of the things that we'll treat.
3.cn: 这个例子非常有用，他会对我们研究其他东西有所帮助。

0.en: Crazy stuff, bragging, crazy stuff, karaoke. No, see, I don't see anything useful here.
0.cn: 极度自恋，疯狂自恋，卡拉OK，不，我在这没得到任何有用的东西。

1.en: A well, Peppa, is a very deep hole with water in it. Woo. And as it happens, I do need water for my garden. So a well will be useful. But that is not a well.
1.cn: 一口井，佩奇，井就是非常深的洞，而且里面还有水。哦！既然已将送来啊了，我的花园确实需要水。而且有一口井还是挺有用的，但是有个应该不是一口真正的井。

2.cn: 一把锋利的切肉刀总是很管用。

3.en: In Brandenburg, I can be useful. I can't here.
3.cn: 我在勃兰登堡能派上用场，在这里就不能了。

4.en: Mr Holmes, you're going to be incredibly useful.
4.cn: 福尔摩斯先生，你会发挥非常大的作用的。

5.en: Did you really? How did it go? How useful really…
5.cn: 真的吗？车子性能还好吗？好的不得了……

6.en: Give me one circumstance in which that would be useful.
6.cn: 给我举个例子，证明这三面手有用武之地。

7.en: Don't worry, Mother, I'll find something useful to do with my life.
7.cn: 别担心，妈妈，我将找到我人生的方向的。

8.en: If I'm gonna be useful in this toon, I have to practice! You will do what I tell you!
8.cn: 我必须训练，才能帮助我的小队。我叫你做什么你就做什么。

9.en: You know, I've known a lot of your kind. All useful, but with you, I sometimes forget.
9.cn: 我认识很多像你这样的复制人。很能干，但是，有时候我甚至会忘了你是个复制人。

10.en: Have you ever considered trying to do something useful? Perhaps, reading to the elderly?
10.cn: 您有没有考虑过干点儿更有意义的事儿呢？比如，给老人念书。

11.en: Well done, Dr Watson. How useful you are. Do you have a suspicion we're being made to compete?
11.cn: 做得好，华生医生，你真是有用。你不觉得我们是在被操纵相互竞争吗？

12.en: Yeah. So you can cook this really and then you can keep it to one side. So it's really useful.
12.cn: 所以你可以先把这个做好备在一边，所以这个菜谱很实用。

13.en: Places without surveillance, blind spots. It also comes in digital. This will be useful indeed.
13.cn: 标注了无监控处，盲点，还有电子版本。这个确实有用。

14.en: Treasure maps are very useful, especial for finding your glasses if you accidentally bury them.
14.cn: 宝藏地图真的太有用了，特别是在你不小心把你的眼镜埋掉，要找眼镜的时候。

15.en: Now you would think his very limited language skills would keep these conversations from being useful.
15.cn: 你们估计可以想到，他那有限的中文水平会让谈话很难正常进行。

16.en: Which would be much more useful than having to deal with the side-effects of the tablets we take today.
16.cn: 这会比我们现今必须服用带有副作用的药物这样的治疗方式来的有用得多。

17.en: I know, the television? Not the telly. No. It's too useful. I know. Daddy's smelly slippers? No. Too smelly.
17.cn: 噢，我知道了，是电视机。这个不可以。是的，它还非常有用。我知道了。爸爸的臭臭拖鞋？不行，实在是太臭了。

18.en: It's useful for calculating the number of atoms in a substance, or causing regret in anyone who asks about it.
18.cn: 可以用来计算物质中的原子数，或是让每个提问者后悔自己提了这问题。

19.en: And are you? Certainly. They could be useful. They're writing a report on why estates like this are going wrong.
19.cn: 那您希望吗？当然了，他们能帮上忙，他们在写一个报告关于我们这种庄园衰落的原因。
